mapper.select: SELECT m.medicalRecordId,m.anamnesis,p.`name`,d.doctorAdviceContent FROM medicalrecord m,patient p,doctoradvice d WHERE m.patientId=p.patientId and m.doctorAdviceId= d.doctorAdviceId
